thread.title: Walt Disney the Father American Experience
thread.title_full: Video: Walt Disney the Father | Watch American Experience Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Walt Disney the Father American Experience
text: Although he was head of a successful film studio, at home, Walt Disney was just "dad" to his two daughters, Diane and Sharon. "Walt Disney" premieres September 14 & 15 on PBS American Experience.
